comments:
I20030930: When using the "Rename" refactoring with the preference "Enable 
refactoring participants" disabled(!) and the Java family example plugin 
installed from older builds, evaluating the participant descriptor from one of 
the rename participants in the example plugin gives an NPE.

The latest Java family project needs the latest JDT/UI and vice versa due to 
changes in the enablement syntax of processors.
